How to Play Roboyard Goal Move the colored robots to their matching colored targets. The game is completed when all robots are on their matching targets. Movement - Tap on a robot to select it. - Tap on an empty cell to move the selected robot in that direction. - Robots will move in straight lines until they hit a wall, another robot, or the edge of the board. Controls - Hint: Shows a suggested move. - Reset: Restarts the current level. - Save: Saves your current map. - Menu: Returns to the main menu. Accessibility This game is fully compatible with TalkBack screen reader. Use explore by touch to hear information about the game elements and buttons. Double-tap to activate buttons or select robots. Tips - Try to solve puzzles in the minimum number of moves. - Sometimes you need to move robots to specific positions to clear paths for other robots. - If you\'re stuck, use the Hint feature to get a suggestion. Star Rating System Your performance on each level is rated with stars based on how efficiently you solve the puzzle: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê - Hyper-optimal solution: You found a solution better than the AI\'s optimal solution! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê - Optimal solution: You solved it in the same number of moves as the AI\'s optimal solution without using hints. ‚≠ê‚≠ê - Near-optimal solution: You used one move more than optimal without hints, OR you found the optimal solution with one hint. ‚≠ê - Good solution: You found the optimal solution with two hints, OR you used two moves more than optimal without hints. No stars: All other cases. Keep practicing to improve your performance! Note: Using hints will reduce your star rating, encouraging you to solve puzzles independently.
